changeSet.comment: New fields "fk_datamanagement_process_id", "source_definition", "source_definition_language", "source_comment" for several tables. Used objects: keyfigure client project sourcesystem data_delivery_object map_object_2_object tool object_depends_on attribute tool_type db_table db_table_field db_table_context db_database scheduling parameter db_table_type object_comment glossary data_delivery_type data_transfer_process data_transfer_type contact_group contact bracket bracket_searchPattern perspective_filter mapping_qualifier url deleted_status export_file_db_table_queue export_file_db_table_params export_file_db_table_result Phabricator tasks: T159 T161 T162
